short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save open tab URLs and reopen them on another PC, on the same PC under another OS, or when they've been lost.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why to use this extension:

Save open tab URLs into local <file.txt> and reopen them:
- on another PC
- on the same PC under another OS
- when they've been lost

Supports:
- multiple windows
- tab groups
- pinned tabs
